languages.text: {n}Пока комендант говорит, вы {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}чувствуете{/d} странное притяжение к определенному месту на площадке — разрытой в рыхлой почве яме. В голове само собой появляется слово — "колыбель". Словно сама яма не представляет собой никакого интереса, однако когда-то в ней находилось нечто очень, очень важное — и смутно вам знакомое.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Пока Комендант говорит, вы чувствуете странное притяжение к определенному месту на площадке — разрытой в рыхлой почве яме. В голове само собой появляется слово — "колыбель". Словно сама яма не представляет собой никакого интереса, однако когда-то в ней находилось нечто очень, очень важное — и смутно вам знакомое.{/n}

languages.text: {n}As the warden is speaking, a strange {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}sensation{/d} draws your attention toward the ground — specifically, an open pit in the loose dirt. A single word spontaneously surfaces in your mind: "cradle." The pit itself does not appear to be of much interest, but at some point, it housed something of great importance — something faintly familiar to you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Пока комендант говорит, вы {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}чувствуете{/d} странное притяжение к определенному месту на площадке — разрытой в рыхлой почве яме. В голове само собой появляется слово — "колыбель". Словно сама яма не представляет собой никакого интереса, однако когда-то в ней находилось нечто очень, очень важное — и смутно вам знакомое.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}As the warden is speaking, you sense a strange pull toward a specific spot — a dug-up pit in the loose dirt. A word spontaneously surfaces in your mind: "cradle." The pit itself does not appear to be of much interest, but at some point, it housed something important indeed — something faintly familiar to you.{/n}

{n}As the warden is speaking, you sense a strange pull toward a specific spot — a dug-up pit in the loose dirt. A word spontaneously surfaces in your mind: "cradle." The pit itself does not appear to be of much interest, but at some point, it housed something important indeed — something faintly familiar to you.{/n}

The pit itself does not appear to be of much interest, but at some point, it housed something of great importance — something faintly familiar to you.{/n}

{n}As the warden is speaking, a strange sensation draws your attention toward the ground — specifically, an open pit in the loose dirt. A single word spontaneously surfaces in your mind: "cradle." The pit itself does not appear to be of much interest, but at some point, it housed something of great importance — something faintly familiar to you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mientras el guardia habla, una extraña {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}sensación{/d} llama tu atención hacia el suelo, en concreto, hacia un hoyo abierto en la tierra suelta. Una palabra se manifiesta súbitamente en tu mente: «cuna». El hoyo en sí no parece tener mucha importancia, pero en algún momento, albergó algo muy importante. Y algo que te resulta familiar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As the warden is speaking, a strange {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}sensation{/d} draws your attention toward the ground — specifically, an open pit in the loose dirt. A single word spontaneously surfaces in your mind: "cradle." The pit itself does not appear to be of much interest, but at some point, it housed something of great importance — something faintly familiar to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mientras el guardia habla, una extraña sensación llama tu atención hacia el suelo, en concreto, hacia un hoyo abierto en la tierra suelta. Una palabra se manifiesta súbitamente en tu mente: «cuna». El hoyo en sí no parece tener mucha importancia, pero en algún momento, albergó algo muy importante. Y algo que te resulta familiar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Während der Wächter spricht, zieht ein merkwürdiges {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}Gefühl{/d} deine Aufmerksamkeit auf den Boden – genauer gesagt auf ein offenes Loch in der losen Erde. Ein einziges Wort schießt dir spontan in den Kopf: "Wiege." Das Loch selbst scheint nicht sonderlich interessant zu sein, doch es hat sich einmal etwas äußerst Wichtiges darin befunden – etwas, was dir ein wenig vertraut vorkommt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As the warden is speaking, a strange {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}sensation{/d} draws your attention toward the ground — specifically, an open pit in the loose dirt. A single word spontaneously surfaces in your mind: "cradle." The pit itself does not appear to be of much interest, but at some point, it housed something of great importance — something faintly familiar to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Während der Wächter spricht, zieht ein merkwürdiges Gefühl deine Aufmerksamkeit auf den Boden — genauer gesagt auf ein offenes Loch in der losen Erde. Ein einziges Wort schießt dir spontan in den Kopf: "Wiege." Das Loch selbst scheint nicht sonderlich interessant zu sein, doch es hat sich einmal etwas äußerst Wichtiges darin befunden — etwas, was dir ein wenig vertraut vorkommt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pendant le discours du directeur, une étrange {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}sensation{/d} attire votre attention vers le sol, et plus précisément, vers un trou béant dans la terre meuble. Spontanément, un mot vous vient à l'esprit : « berceau ». Si la fosse en elle-même paraît relativement quelconque, elle a contenu à une époque quelque chose de très important... quelque chose que vous avez l'impression de connaître.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As the warden is speaking, a strange {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}sensation{/d} draws your attention toward the ground — specifically, an open pit in the loose dirt. A single word spontaneously surfaces in your mind: "cradle." The pit itself does not appear to be of much interest, but at some point, it housed something of great importance — something faintly familiar to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pendant le discours du directeur, une étrange sensation attire votre attention vers le sol, et plus précisément, vers un trou béant dans la terre meuble. Spontanément, un mot vous vient à l'esprit : « berceau ». Si le trou en lui-même paraît relativement quelconque, il a contenu à une époque quelque chose de très important... quelque chose que vous avez l'impression de connaître.{/n}

languages.text: {n}典狱长说话的时候，某种古怪的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}感觉{/d}让你不禁望向地面，确切地说，是望向松软土地上露出的一个坑。看到那个坑的时候，你的脑中立刻浮现出了一个词：摇篮。这个坑本身平平无奇，但它曾经盛放过某些很重要的东西，某些你似乎有点印象的东西。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As the warden is speaking, a strange {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}sensation{/d} draws your attention toward the ground — specifically, an open pit in the loose dirt. A single word spontaneously surfaces in your mind: "cradle." The pit itself does not appear to be of much interest, but at some point, it housed something of great importance — something faintly familiar to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}典狱长说话的时候，某种古怪的感觉让你不禁望向地面，确切地说，是望向松软土地上露出的一个坑。看到那个坑的时候，你的脑中立刻浮现出了一个词：摇篮。这个坑本身平平无奇，但它曾经盛放过某些很重要的东西，某些你似乎有点印象的东西。{/n}

languages.text: {n}所長が話しているその時、地面の緩い土にポッカリと開いた穴から伝わる奇妙な{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}感覚{/d}に気づく。「ゆりかご」という単語がふと頭に浮かんだ。この穴自体は何の変哲もないものだが、いつかの時、そこにはとても重要で馴染み深い何かがあったのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As the warden is speaking, a strange {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}sensation{/d} draws your attention toward the ground — specifically, an open pit in the loose dirt. A single word spontaneously surfaces in your mind: "cradle." The pit itself does not appear to be of much interest, but at some point, it housed something of great importance — something faintly familiar to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}所長が話しているその時、地面から、特にそのサラサラした土にポッカリと開いた穴から伝わる奇妙な感覚に気づく。「ゆりかご」というひとつの単語がふと頭に浮かんだ。この穴自体は何の変哲もないものだが、いつかの過去に、そこにはとても重要な何か…どこか馴染み深い何かがあったのだ。{/n}
{n}所長が話しているその時、地面の緩い土にポッカリと開いた穴から伝わる奇妙な{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}感覚{/d}に気づく。「ゆりかご」という単語がふと頭に浮かんだ。この穴自体は何の変哲もないものだが、いつかの時、そこにはとても重要で馴染み深い何かがあったのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Müdür konuşurken garip bir {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}his{/d}, senin dikkatini yere, özellikle de gevşek topraktaki açık bir çukura çekiyor. Zihninde birdenbire tek bir kelime beliriyor: "Beşik". Çukurun kendisi pek ilgi çekici görünmese de bir noktada, büyük önem taşıyan, belli belirsiz bir aşinalık sezdiğin bir şeyi barındırıyordu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As the warden is speaking, a strange {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}sensation{/d} draws your attention toward the ground — specifically, an open pit in the loose dirt. A single word spontaneously surfaces in your mind: "cradle." The pit itself does not appear to be of much interest, but at some point, it housed something of great importance — something faintly familiar to you.{/n}

Çukurun kendisi pek ilgi çekici görünmese de bir noktada, büyük önem taşıyan, belli belirsiz bir aşinalık sezdiğin bir şeyi barındırıyordu.{/n}
